section.title: taIdent
section.para: Text Analysis Concept Identifier - the taIdent attribute is the [ITS] defined taIdent attribute.

The text string is supposed to be a human or machine redable identifier of a concept within a collection of text analysis concept resources, in the sense of an identifier of the concept in the collection.

listitem.para: When the attribute taIdent is set, the taSource attribute must be set as well.

section.para: See the ITS Text Analysis Annotation for the full normative usage description of this attribute. Other advanced Constraints follow from that normative usage description.
